paragraphs.title: Read the real-time Likes coming from kafka

result.msg:
cassandraConfig: scala.collection.immutable.Map[String,String] = Map(keyspace -> fluxcapacitor, table -> likes)
likesDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [from_user_id: int, to_user_id: int, batch_time: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Use the dataFrame API to query the real-time likes
Show number of distinct Real-time participating users
register the real-time likes as a temp table

result.msg: res348: likesDF.type = [from_user_id: int, to_user_id: int, batch_time: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Use SQL to Show Most desirable users by Like Count
paragraphs.text: %sql SELECT name, count(to_user_id) as count FROM likes_temp JOIN actresses_and_actors_perm ON (likes_temp.to_user_id = actresses_and_actors_perm.id) GROUP BY name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

result.msg:
name	count
Morgan Freeman	9
James Franco	5
Robert De Niro	5
Leonardo DiCaprio	5
Anthony Hopkins	5

paragraphs.text: %md ### Compare The Physical Plans Between DataFrames And SQL (Should Be Equal)

result.msg: Compare The Physical Plans Between DataFrames And SQL (Should Be Equal)

paragraphs.title: Explain Plan for SQL Query
paragraphs.text:
val topKUsersByLikesDF = sqlContext.sql("SELECT count(to_user_id) as count FROM likes_temp GROUP BY to_user_id ORDER BY count DESC")

topKUsersByLikesDF.explain()

result.msg:
topKUsersByLikesDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [count: bigint]
== Physical Plan ==
TungstenSort [count#438L DESC], true, 0
 ConvertToUnsafe
  Exchange rangepartitioning(count#438L DESC)
   ConvertToSafe
    TungstenAggregate(key=[to_user_id#390], functions=[(count(to_user_id#390),mode=Final,isDistinct=false)], output=[count#438L])
     TungstenExchange hashpartitioning(to_user_id#390)
      TungstenAggregate(key=[to_user_id#390], functions=[(count(to_user_id#390),mode=Partial,isDistinct=false)], output=[to_user_id#390,currentCount#459L])
       InMemoryColumnarTableScan [to_user_id#390], (InMemoryRelation [from_user_id#389,to_user_id#390,batch_time#391L], true, 10000, StorageLevel(true, true, false, true, 1), (Project [fromuserid#386 AS from_user_id#389,touserid#387 AS to_user_id#390,batchtime#388L AS batch_time#391L]), None)

== Physical Plan ==
TungstenSort [count#461L DESC], true, 0
 ConvertToUnsafe
  Exchange rangepartitioning(count#461L DESC)
   ConvertToSafe
    TungstenAggregate(key=[to_user_id#390], functions=[(count(1),mode=Final,isDistinct=false)], output=[to_user_id#390,count#461L])
     TungstenExchange hashpartitioning(to_user_id#390)
      TungstenAggregate(key=[to_user_id#390], functions=[(count(1),mode=Partial,isDistinct=false)], output=[to_user_id#390,currentCount#480L])
       InMemoryColumnarTableScan [to_user_id#390], (InMemoryRelation [from_user_id#389,to_user_id#390,batch_time#391L], true, 10000, StorageLevel(true, true, false, true, 1), (Project [fromuserid#386 AS from_user_id#389,touserid#387 AS to_user_id#390,batchtime#388L AS batch_time#391L]), None)
